    • About Max Folkers


    There are a lot of great Realtors here in San Diego, but we think we are the perfect choice for your real estate needs. Over the last 10 years, I have had the opportunity to apply the integrity, attention to detail, and work ethic that served me well as a Navy pilot, to helping hundreds of families buy or sell a home of their own in San Diego.

    My team and I pride ourselves on using cutting edge technology combined with the latest and greatest marketing information to give you, our clients, access to the most up-to-date information out there. I love what I do, and I love helping families achieve their goals with the greatest asset in their lives, their homes.
